thread.title: Microsol Resources Announces Expansion and Move of Boston Office and Training Center to Financial District
thread.title_full: Microsol Resources Announces Expansion and Move of Boston Office and Training Center to Financial District

author: admin
title: Microsol Resources Announces Expansion and Move of Boston Office and Training Center to Financial District
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/15/2015 @ 8:14 AM   Microsol Resources 
BOSTON, Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Microsol Resources Corporation, an Autodesk Platinum Partner and a recognized leader in CAD and BIM Solutions serving the architectural, engineering and construction industries, is pleased to announce the move of its Boston office to a new location in the heart of the Financial District. Located on the tenth floor of 2 Oliver Street, the new facility features a state-of-the-art training center, capable of handling classes of up to 10 students. 
Founded in 1986 and named by Autodesk in 2014 as its "Partner of the Year," Microsol Resources is an Autodesk Platinum Partner focused on helping customers design, simulate and analyze their ideas while simultaneously maximizing their return on investment in software solutions. We deliver an unyielding commitment to customer satisfaction, as well as offer best-in-class resources; from pre and post-sales support to consulting, training, implementation, and customization. 
"With the expansion and move to our new office at 2 Oliver Street we will be able to increase our ability to support the growing number of clients we have, not just in Boston and the Boston Metro area, but also in New England in general," said Emilio Krausz, President, Microsol Resources. "We are now just a short walk away from the offices of many of our current and future clients and from South Station." 
"We're excited to have Microsol Resources join us in downtown Boston, in the heart of the Boston AEC community. We've been able to build a relationship with them and our staff, understanding our project needs and pursuing solutions to our architectural project workflows," said Dan Gallivan, the Director of IT from Payette. "They've demonstrated a strong willingness to work with our teams and continue to develop that bond, assisting us in navigating the complex building information future. In a time of building customer support and community relations, they are a strong team player." 
For additional information about Microsol Resources, visit www.microsolresources.com . 
About Microsol Resources 
Microsol Resources has been delivering integrated solutions to the architecture, engineering and construction (AEC) industries for 27 years. It is a recognized leader in building information modeling (BIM) technology solutions, as well as an Autodesk Platinum Partner with offices in New York, NY and Philadelphia, PA and most recently in Charlestown, MA, with a professional staff of BIM/CAD Applications Experts focused on supporting the AEC community. 
From technical support, to BIM implementation, basic and advanced training, standards development, model management services, staffing and 3D printing, our services are designed to address AEC firms' specific needs. For more information, please visit www.microsolresources.com . 
Autodesk, the Autodesk logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Autodesk, Inc., and/or its subsidiaries and/or affiliates in the USA and/or other countries.
